resources.string: JD college of Engineering and Management Nagpur

JD College of Engineering and Management, shortly referred to as JDCOEM, was established in 2008 as a private autonomous institute in Nagpur. It offers multiple specializations under B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA, and Ph.D. courses. Admissions to these courses are on the basis of various entrance examinations such as JEE Main, MH CET, GATE, etc. Applications are accepted online. The college has a placement rate of 78.46%, with Amazon and HCL among its top recruiters. It also provides scholarships.
